changelog: v1.5.7: Fix NSIS PATH on windows-latest â€” dynamically locate makensis.exe, fall back to Chocolatey install.
changes: FIX: deploy.yml NSIS step now uses Get-ChildItem to locate makensis.exe under any 'C:\Program Files*\NSIS' path
FIX: Falls back to 'choco install nsis -y' if makensis.exe not found anywhere on the runner
REM: Removed hardcoded 'Add NSIS to PATH' step that assumed C:\Program Files (x86)\NSIS
